title: Drawing, "Saberreta, Ecuador", July 23, 1857
markings:
Recto:  Stamped in ink, at lower left:  Lugt 457c
Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center: Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribe in graphite, at upper right: 2; again, at farther right:  2 -- clear light green; and at lower left:  Saberreta  July 23d // 57
description: Horizontal view of a hilly landscape covered by trees and plants with a stream flowing past a laden donkey at lower right, and shown in a vertical direction at right side a hilly landscpe with trees and water plants.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Saberreta, Ecuador", July 23, 1857.
July 23, 1857. Graphite on gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-266.
